_header: The higher degree the more wise [The herrere degre þe more wys]
Title(s): Man bewarre er the be woo
_description: ‘Man bewarre er the be woo’ — fourteen 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

BodDig102.First Lines:
The herrer degre þe more wysþe gretter worschip þe
                    nobler fame…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…Er ȝoure synnes ȝoure soules apeleEche man be war
                    er hym be woo
BodDig102.Attributed Title: Man be warre er the be woo (f. 113)

YaleBei163.First Lines:
The Wyse man his sone forbedeMasons crafte and alle
                    clymbynge…
YaleBei163.Last Lines:
…Better pu were to kys the yatisAnd euer be warre or pu be
                    woo
